subject: Football (College)
Epilepsy
Seizures (Medical)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Coach Jerry Kill, who had a seizure and missed last Saturday’s game at Michigan, has stepped away to focus on treating and managing his epilepsy.
snippet: Minnesota Coach Jerry Kill, who had a seizure and missed last Saturday’s game at Michigan, has stepped away to focus on treating and managing his epilepsy.
